questions.question_text:
Cindy is the network security administrator for her company. She just got back from a security conference in Las Vegas where they talked about all kinds of old and new security threats; many of which she did not know of. She is worried about the current security state of her company's network so she decides to start scanning the network from an external IP address. To see how some of the hosts on her network react, she sends out SYN packets to an IP range. A number of
IPs respond with a SYN/ACK response. Before the connection is established, she sends RST packets to those hosts to stop the session. She has done this to see how her intrusion detection system will log the traffic. What type of scan is Cindy attempting here?

discussion.content:
SYN then RST is not a half-open scan.

SYN Scan– Also referred to as a half-open scan, it only sends a SYN, and waits for a SYN-ACK response from the target. If a response is received, the scanner never responds. Since the TCP connection was not completed, the system doesn’t log the interaction, but the sender has learned if the port is open or not.

https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/cyberpedia/what-is-a-port-scan#:~:text=SYN%20Scan%E2%80%93%20Also%20referred%20to,port%20is%20open%20or%20not.

choices.C: Cindy is using a half-open scan to find live hosts on her network.
choices.D: She is utilizing a RST scan to find live hosts that are listening on her network.
choices.A: The type of scan she is using is called a NULL scan.
choices.B: Cindy is attempting to find live hosts on her company's network by using a XMAS scan.

questions.question_text: The SOC manager is reviewing logs in AlienVault USM to investigate an intrusion on the network. Which CND approach is being used?

discussion.content: The retrospective approach examines the causes for attacks in the network.

Pipe Model: QoS guarantees the traffic from one Customer Edge (CE) to another

Hose Model: A customer’s CE router sends to and receives from other CE routers on the same VPN

questions.question_text: Which VPN QoS model guarantees the traffic from one customer edge (CE) to another?

choices.A: They function on the data link layer.
choices.C: They function on either the application or the physical layer.
choices.B: They work on the network layer.
choices.D: They work on the session layer.

discussion.content: Internet protocol security (IPsec) is a network layer protocol that ensures a secure IP level communication

questions.question_text: Heather has been tasked with setting up and implementing VPN tunnels to remote offices. She will most likely be implementing IPsec VPN tunnels to connect the offices. At what layer of the OSI model does an IPsec tunnel function on?

Management asked their network administrator to suggest an appropriate backup medium for their backup plan that best suits their organization's need. Which of the following factors will the administrator consider when deciding on the appropriate backup medium? (Choose all that apply.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABD
CND Book P.1269
best backup media is based on the following factors: Cost, Reliability, Speed, Availability, Usability
